title: Leaverbuster gave me one
body:
Ive been playing lately full games and now they said I went afk. I haven't even afked since the new client came out.
Also where do you find presets?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we're locked out of making any changes to Leaverbuster penalties, so if the system flagged for you inactivity, there's nothing I can do to reverse the penalty. The system is designed this way to prevent any abuse.

Can you clarify what you mean by presets?
In the new client I can't find the section where you can make a build before the game and use it instead of the recommended build. Where is it now?

Ah, so Item Sets haven't been added to the Beta Client. It's still unknown whether this is a feature that will be migrated over to the new client. You can still use them in-game, but you'll need to edit/create them inside the *Legacy Client* (which you can launch into at the login screen for the Beta), then launch into a match within the Legacy Client to ensure the Item Set was saved before launching back into the *Beta Client* to play a match.

Let me know if you have any questions.
